channel.title: ~ Project Reality -HUGE PROJECT- ~
channel.description:
Hello users,
This is a project of a RuneScape Private Server (RSPS) Called project reality; Which will be done by at least 15 coders and scripters of MoparScape.
If you don't really understand; This server is about Reality RPG.
Features: -RPG World. -Over 150 Quests. -12 Worlds. -MemberShip Feature. -High Details and Low Details. -High Graphics (Graphic Masters Coders). -High Quality (HQ). -Sounds (Fighting, Running, Walking, Cutting, Dying Sounds). -Jobs (Such as: Police, Worker, Drug Dealer, Weapon Dealer, Will be using Special Models). -When you join this server; Your name would probably be like Firstname_Lastname, You will be automatically kicked if your not (We will put a Notice on Client)
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
If you would like to apply to join this project; You must have the following Requirements: 1. PHP Skills. 2. HTML Skills. 3. Java Skills. 4. Graphic Skills. 5. Must be at least 16 years old.
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
How to Apply? -Add this Code into your reply with your application; To join our project.
[code] Full Name:
Age:
Experience with our Requirements:
Why would you like to join?:
How many years have been you coding PHP, and Java Coding?:
[/code]
More information can be found if you leave me a reply; Also remember, Please do not Private Message me because I no longer open them; and read them.
Notice #1: Faking that your Older than 16; You will be Directly/Instantly Fired (Demoted). Notice #2: We have 6 Coders, And this project will be Huge, and big. Notice #3: Posting any non-related questions to this Topic would probably get you a punishment from the MoparScape Team; I will report them.
---

item.title: ~ Project Reality -HUGE PROJECT- ~
item.dc:creator: @Sneaky1 Sneaky_
item.description:
@Sneaky1 wrote:

Hello users,

This is a project of a RuneScape Private Server (RSPS) Called project reality; Which will be done by at least 15 coders and scripters of MoparScape.

If you don’t really understand; This server is about Reality RPG.

Features:
-RPG World.
-Over 150 Quests.
-12 Worlds.
-MemberShip Feature.
-High Details and Low Details.
-High Graphics (Graphic Masters Coders).
-High Quality (HQ).
-Sounds (Fighting, Running, Walking, Cutting, Dying Sounds).
-Jobs (Such as: Police, Worker, Drug Dealer, Weapon Dealer, Will be using Special Models).
-When you join this server; Your name would probably be like Firstname_Lastname, You will be automatically kicked if your not (We will put a Notice on Client)

If you would like to apply to join this project; You must have the following Requirements:

  1. PHP Skills.
  2. HTML Skills.
  3. Java Skills.
  4. Graphic Skills.
  5. Must be at least 16 years old.

How to Apply?
-Add this Code into your reply with your application; To join our project.

Full Name:

Age:

Experience with our Requirements:

Why would you like to join?:

How many years have been you coding PHP, and Java Coding?:

More information can be found if you leave me a reply; Also remember, Please do not Private Message me because I no longer open them; and read them.

Notice #1: Faking that your Older than 16; You will be Directly/Instantly Fired (Demoted).
Notice #2: We have 6 Coders, And this project will be Huge, and big.
Notice #3: Posting any non-related questions to this Topic would probably get you a punishment from the MoparScape Team; I will report them.
